top_rare_diseases.overview: A rare genetic disorder characterized by kidney disease, hearing loss, and eye abnormalities.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Genetic mutations in the COL4A3, COL4A4, or COL4A5 genes
top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Genetic testing, kidney biopsy, hearing tests, and eye exams
top_rare_diseases.treatment: Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors, angiotensin receptor blockers, and kidney transplantation
